Text: being first aint sh*t if the quality sux. wtf nigga! your last release was alright. This joint is cropped, and the audio is terra belle. sh*t sounds straight mono. Maybe you did it ironically, you know, because the episode is about thugnificent falling off. More likely you just suck. Try encoding from the broadcast instead of the online stream next time, nigga.
Man don't listen to the haters, ez.  Keep up the good work.

the only thing i hate more then wannabe ass white boys are people that hate on others on TPB when they work hard to bring you and everyone else free shit. 

hsirrine, do us all a favor and jump off a building

eztv, keep up the good work yo!

@ hsirrine  It's amazing how freely the N word flows out in your text about a TV show that also uses the word. Only they do it to be comical and you seem to use it like it's part of your everyday vocabulary which is pathetically ignorant. 

I mean, really? You think you're hurting EZTV's feelings and can stop them from giving us FREE torrents with your ghetto trash talk? Really? I bet if you do read this, you'll probably and stupidly spit out more stereotypical cliches. Just remember: one monkey don't stop the show.
